S.FORM: = Kurgyzstan = Gaga kska Yacow ka Kurgyzstan, 41 00 N, 75 00 E ka gaga na nniqan. Kana ka knlbangan na o 199,951 sq km (hangan na o Tg87) (knlbanga dxgal o 191,801 sq km, knlbangan qsiya o 8,150 sq km). Kana ka sejiqun o niqan 5,727,553 hiyi. Gaga Bishkek ka pusu alang paru, jiyax 31 idas 8 ka jiyax skrayan klwaan. Manu ka dxgal Kurgyzstan ga wada sugan 55.40% ka dxgal qpahan, 5.10% ka dxgal bbuyu, rahuq dxgal do niqan 39.50% na. Bukung klwaan ta sayang o kiya ka Almazbek Atambayev, pnaah hngkawas2011 idas 12 jiyax 1pnrajing kmlawa klwaan. cinkhulan sa knita' sa brbiru' = Ciarcis = Ciarcis Konghkwo ngalan dha Ciarcis, kiya ka kingal qnlhangan wa mniq dxral kcka Asia. Tudaya Ciarcis mi Hasak u msqapah, tuiwal ka Ucpik, tuiwil hunac ka Tacik, tunarac u msdalih Cyokoku. Piskayk ka sotu Ciarcis mi knbeyhing bay alang mkbrnux. Knrudan bay qnlhangan kcka Asia, niqan 2000 kngkawas ka rikisi Ciarcis, mnuda ou kluwanan wangcaw mi bungka. Alaw ka wa tqriyan dwiyaq mi pbruxun nanaq, kiya ka malu pltudul ka bungka Ciarcis; kiya mi alaw nniqan lnlingay uri, wa mniq strngan ou kluwanan waya ka Ciarcis. Ana so qnbsyaqan bay nniqan dha mniq Ciarcis ka knou bay alang, binaw mncun niqan qnhlangan icil miyah knrmux qmlahang. Dhuq kngkawas 1991 peyyah ida nSuryeyn babaw dukuricu daw, wada mkingal niqan dukuricu pusu biyax na minjoku qnlhangan ka Ciarcis. Pnwaya quri seyji u murux kingal mi gikay. Ana beytaq saya u mncun niqan mtdiyal ka minjoku, pspaux prrudu mi qnnriqu quri keyjay. Saya u wisu tumal Dukuricu pnsliyan qnlhangan, Oco keyjay ryeynmong mi Citi anjeyng ryeynmong na qnlhangan; kiya uri u tumal Sanghay hecwocucu, Isran hecwocucu, Tucyey gikay mi Tucyey bungka kwoci cucu na cngyeynkwo. Ciarcis pa niqan 570 kinbkiyan knhbrawan hiyi sediq. Pusu bay minjoku ka Ciarcis joku (Mniq kcka dxral Cyokoku ka Ciarcis u ngalan dha Kearkc joku), msngari u Ucpeyk joku mi Russia joku. Kari Ciarcis ka ngalan kari qnlhangan, kiya mi mniq 1 seyki ka dndulan mkRussia cngce ida kari Russia ka ddiyun dha balay mi ngalan srngaw kari seyhu. 64% knhbrawan sediq ka ucongpay Muslim. Uxay wana niqan bungka Tucyey nanaq, bungka Ciarcis pa wada dndulan bungka Mongku, bungka Posu mi bungka Russia uri. Ris Spuda kngkawas so niyi hari u Ciarcis mi Cyokoku rikisi sweycya ka wada sndiyan, qnbsyaqan bay rikisi Ciarcis u malu bhraun dhuq brah AD. 201. Jidayi saya u niqan bnatas qnbsyaqan bay patas ka "Suci", cida ka sediq Ciarcis u splawa dha Cyeynkun. Kari Tucyey u Qırğız, kiya ka patas bnatas Suci Cyokoku sunca Cikas, kiya ka sediq Kearkc saya, "Suci" ka mnwaya bay bnatas quri ndanan sediq Karkc, splawa dha "Kekun". Ryanghan cida u splawa dha "Cyeynkun", WeyCin Nanpeycaw dhuq Sweytay cida u splawa dha "Cyeyku", "Ciku", "Hku", "Huku". Tangtay cida spuda hnang kari Han u splawa dha "Syakas". Utay 10 qnlhangan, Ryaw, Song, King cida splawa dha "Hricis" Dungan, Mongku tikwo, Yentay cida u splawa dha "Ciricis" uri, Kana pnhangan niyi u kiya ka dmuwi knkingal ndanan cida ini pntna hnang kari pnhangan. Cingtay cida spuda pnlawa dha sediq Mongku Erut u, splawa dha Purut. Kiya ka Man, Cinca, Citan minjoku pnyahan Hasak Hankwo u pnlawa dha Ciarcis ka "Seartkrk" (dungus na u "sediq icil"), uxay na tnpusu Ciarcis. Tnpusu balay nniqan sediq Ciarcis u mnniq tuhunac Siporiya, dxral tudaya yayung Yeynise. Mndanan knrmujx qmlahang Syongnu, babaw tu2 kcka seyki daw yahan knrmux qmlahang Tucyey Hankwo, Hweyhe Hankwo, bukuy daw mniq kngyeyn kngkawa 840 u wada dha ini baka ka Hweyhe Hankwo dmi wada dukuricu bsiyaq hari, dhuq kngyeyn kngkawas 924 daw kiya ka wada yahan knrmux qmlahang Ryawcaw pnhyuwan na Yeyryuapawci. Yeyntay u mniq tudaya yayung Yeynise phiyu Yiranco, Cyeynco. Dhuq 17 seyki, wada yahan snhur pddayak Cwenkear Hankwo sediq Mongku mi sediq Russia tikwo, wada kndudul thdil lmiqu dwiyaq Tyeysan na quri langu Isek, kiya ka nniqan Ciarcis saya. Cingtay, alang Ciarcis pa psnakan Tunarac Purut, Tuiwil Purut. Tuiwil Purut u tmabu tnbuwan mniq dxral kcka Hweypu, skdakar qmlahang Kskar Cancan Tacn mi knkingan elu Cuca Tacn, Tunarac Purut ka Cingcaw cingway na tnualang sediq Tnpusu. Tangcaw AD. 640 idas 9 diyax 19 (Cnkwan kngkawas 14 idas 8 kweyyi, nongri idas 8 diyax 28), Cyawhtaw singcyun tacongkwan Hocyunci ping Kawcang, ngalan na phiyu Sico ka dxral hiya. AD. 640 idas 10 diyax 11 (Cnkwan kngkawas 14 idas 9 imaw, nongri idas 9 diyax 21), mniq Sico phiyu Ansi tuhuhu, pqriyun dha quri Tuiwil Tucyey. Cnkwan kngkawas 22 (AD. 648), Ansi tuhuhu thdilan dhuq Kweyc. Tang Kawcong Syeycing kngkawas 2 (AD. 657) idas 11, wada ini baka Tangcyun ka Tucyey, wada thdilun nniqan Kawcang Dungan ka Ansi tuhuhu. Syeyncing kngkawas 3 idas 5 (AD. 657), Ansi tuhuhu u wada thdilun Kweyc (Kucyu saya), wada mkala mtatuhuhu ka Ansi tuhuhu. Tang Kawcong u knpriyux Taycong cida wana snbeyhing qmita cyunsu mi sntikuh mita qmlahang singcng ka uuda na, mniq nniqan dxral Tucyey psnakan phiyu Mongc tuhuhu mi Kwenring tuhuhu, kiya mi psnakun phiyu Cyumi cohu ka ttiping qnlhangan sdan dhiya, dxral tuiwil u dhuq Posu, kiya ka to bay dxral Ansi tahuhu kana, so kasi yahi qmlahang Tangcaw kana ka dxral quri hini. Syeyncing kngkawas 5 (AD. 660), wa mniq Congring tuiwil na Tucyey Tumapu u wada smnul Tang, snkaul sediq musa qmita ka cawting. Tang Kawcong Rongsyo kngkawas pnrdingan (AD. 661), snkaul Tuhworwo tawcuco syeynsu Waming qmita tuiwil Congring dungan, mniq tuiwil Yutyeyn, tunarac Posu 16 qnlhangan, phiyu 16 tutuhu, kana bay u 80 ka co, 110 ka keyng, 126 ka cyuhu, kiya mi mniq Tuhworwo phiyu pnsdhuwan smnru ndanan niyi. Mniq cida, Ansi tatuhuhu na qmlahang knkana Ansi sucn, Mongcu, Kwenring tuhuhu (dxral nniqan tuiwil Tucyey cbiyaw), Cawwu 9 sing, Tuhworwo dhuq Posu tutuhu, mntna hari so knbeyhing pnspuwan Sincyang mi Congya 5 qnlhangan, Ahuhan saya. Babaw Rongsyo kngkawas 2 (kongyeyn 662) adw, Tuhwan mi Tangcaw u snpusal ppluk Ansi 4 cn, hini u ou bay yiso, dhuq Tang Tcongcnyeyn kngkawas 6 (kongyen kngkawas 790), Ansi 4 cn u wada skkingal pkngatun kana. Ucetyeyn Cangan kngkawas 2 (AD.702), phiyu Peyting tuhuhu, qmlahang ida qmnlahangan Ansi tatuhuhu ka Tyeynsan peyru, tunarac Jehay na dxral nniqan tuiwil Tucyey, wana Tyeynsan nanru mi nniqan tunarac Congring ka qlhangan Ansi tatuhuhu, kiya ka dhuq mdakar sntangan aawah dha mpkrmux quri Sco cru mquri tudaya mcbu ka Tuhwan. Siryaw cida Siryaw (AD.1124 dhuq 1218) kiya ka sediq Citan Yeyryutasu pnhiyu na qnlhangan, hiti daw wada mrana dhuq Congya, Husworutwo (wa mniq msdalih Ciarcis Tokmak na alang mkbrnux Purana saya), cida u mbiyax bay qnlhangan Congya. AD.1218 cida u wada pkngatun heytay Mongku dndulan Cngcishan. Dxral cbiyaw nniqan Siryaw pa wa mniq dxral Cngcishan psuwan na tu2 hiyi risaw na Cahtay, Cahtay Hankwo hiti daw wada dmudul ddiyun bay kari Cahtay (hiti daw wada mkkari Weyuar mi mkkari Ucpeyk). Cahtay Hankwo cida (13-14 seyki) ) Cahtay Hankwo u ida kiya dxral Tyeymucn pndungus na tu2 risaw na Cahtay. Pnrdingan bay dxral nniqan cbiyaw u, kiya ka knkana Tyeynsan naru mi Tyeynsan peyru mi yayung Yurtus mi yayung Manas ryoyu mi iyax yayung Ymu mi yayung Siar na nniqan yayung Congya (mbiyax bay cida u peyyah dwiyaq Aartay dhuq Syeynhay). Hana balay han u phyuwan mniq msdalih Arimari na Huyas (Kuarri), kiya ka Cyoka jnmin konghkwo na Sincyang Hwocngsyeyn Sweytingcn tuiwil daya. Cahtay Hankwo cyucu Tuwa mi Wokwotay Hankwo cyuncu Haytu u mnsupu, snpusal mccbu heytay Weyncaw,beytaq Hupiryey cida u ini stuq na,mndhuq mangal canmopey Harahrin. Dhuq kongyeyn 1304 u prading tuhuy Haytucca tu8 risaw na Weyncngcong psbalay. Cingcaw cida Cingkawcong Cyeynrong kngkawas 22 (AD.1757), pingting Cwenkear Mongku daw, wada yahan knrmux qmlahang Cingcaw ka sediq Ciarcis. Mquri Cingcaw thmuku ka sediq Ciarcis pa wada dha splawa "Purut"; psnakan tunarac mi tuiwil ddha, tuiwil Purut u wa mniq tnuda yomu tuiwil yayung tudaya na Ksekear, Yeyarcyang tuiwil hunac; kana bay u niqan 4 beyhing alang; tunarac Purut u wa tnuda yomu Use, tuiwil daya Aksu, tuiwil hunac Iri, knkana bay u niqan 5 alang. Hhiti daw wada mowic ka Cingcaw dmi, mniq AD.1864 na "Cong E kan psnakan tnuayus tuiwil daya weyci" wada bqanan Russia tikwo ka Waysipey, alaw snul tndxral mniq ka sediq, sediq Ciarcis u kndadax ndanan knrmux qmlahang Russia (duma u alaw wada tbrinah knciyuk ka Cwenkear Hankwo mi wada subway Heyrongcyang Huyukeyng Cyeyrongti. Rikisi msdalih hari kngkawas niyi 18 seyki, nniqan Ciarcis saya pnsnaqan Cwenkear Mongku (tudaya) mi Hawhan Hankwo (tuhunac) na biyax nniqan dxral. 19 seyki kngkkawas 20, wada mrana ka biyax Hawhan, kana nniqan Ciarcis u wada mnHawhan Hankwo kana. AD.1854, musa knrmux mcbu Hawhan Hankwo ka Russia, kiya mi spuda ou kluwanan waycyaw sotwan pkiyux Cingting srwanan dukuricu hnyuwan kana ka nniqan Congya knkingal Hwansu. AD.1876 cida, wada pkngatun ka qnlhangan Hawhan, knkana nniqan Ciarcis u wada yahan knrmux qmlahang Russia kana. Wada krmxan qmlahang Russia pa, snturung ou bay knciyuk, niqan hbaraw bay sediq u wada kasi latac nniqan dha tndxral mi wada thdil icil, mtmay Pamiar brnux baraw mi Ahuhan; binaw duma u, mntna qlhangan cida u Cingcaw nniqan Syakan na sediq Hwey ka tbrinah knciyuk, wada ini baka ka sediq Hwey u thdil mquri tudaya dhuq mkngahu yayung Cu saya, wada mrudan cbiyaw sediq Tongkan. AD.1916 cida, muruc knciyuk undo ka Russia, hbaraw bay sediq Ciarcis u kndadax Congya thdil dhuq pnhyuwan burah na Cyokaminkoku cida. AD.1922 cida, phiyu cida ka Suryeyn u mnTucyey Stan Suweyay Sehuycuyi Cckonghkwo. AD.1924 cida, muda pnwaya tnuayus minjoku ka nniqan Congya, Ciarcis saya u psdhu phiyu Kara Ciarcis Ccco, wada tumal Russia Ryeynpang. AD.1925 cida u wada knpriyux hangan Ciarcis Ccco, dhuq AD.1926 cida daw wada mkala Ciarcis Suweyay Sehuycuyi Cckonghkwo Dungan. AD.1936 idas 12 diyax 5, balay bay psdhuwan phiyu ka Ciarcis Suweyay Sehuycuyi Konghkwo, wada tumal ryeynpang na Suryeyn. AD.1991 idas 8 diyax 19, konghkwo cinci cwangtay yingkay (SCSE) dha u sntama biyax dnyawan quri Mosuk, smatang dha plixun ka soto Akayeyhu. Wada ini pndungus dmi babaw kingal iyax sngayan, Akayeyhu mi huku soto Kucnyeytohu u pusa kari mlatac Suryeyn kyosanto, malix qpahun suki, kiya mi wada na plhlah kana ka qnpringan seyhu. Wada dndulan uuda niyi, lmutuc mniq idas 8 diyax 31 na knbeyhing bay Suweyay gikay meytaq hyocida u pusa kari ptalax kndadax Suryeyn dukuricu, AD.1933 idas 5 diyax 5, wada knpriyux hangan qnlhangan Ciarcis Konghkwo. Cngc AD.1990 kngkkawas pnrdingan cida, peyyah kcka kyosanto knpruyux pssli ka Ciarcis micu undo (Democratic Movement Kyrgyzstan, DMK) mi Awse u wada msminjoku mtdiyal, wada ini snhiyi ssediq mi gikay ka Ciarcis kyosanto tu1 suki Masariyeyhu , wada mlih ka biyax ddha dha daw, Akayeyhu , Ciarcis ksweyyan na ingcyo, mniq AD.1990 idas 10 msdurux syeynkyo cida wada mangal 95% hyo mi mangal soto mwaya bay soto peyyah dukuricu. AD.1993 cida wada psdhun ka keyngpo pa seyhu ticu u mincu konghcu na konghkwo. Singcng pumn u knkana soto mi congri, kokoingkay u pnwaya 2 ing, shwa pumn u kiya ka knkana knbaraw hoing, keyngpo hwating, tihwang hoing mi keynsa congcang. Spuda qnqriqu ka keyjay, AD.1994 kngkkawas kcka prading, Akayeyhu u kndudul mquri dmuwi weycweyn qmlahang. Lmutuc ou kngkawas, mniq kcka gikay mtdiyal kari, Akayeyhu spuda kongmin meytaq hyo msdurux meysa dnkuhan ssediq qnlhangan, knkana AD.1996 idas 2 mi AD.1998 idas 10 na snbrinah smmalu keyngpo pkrana biyax soto mi snbrinah knpriyux waya seyngkyo. AD.2002 idas 3 mniq tuhunac nniqan Ahesi u, niqan 6 hiyi sediq hantay knhmuc qmraq bukung hantaytang na sediq mpdudul seyji u, wada bun puniq phuqil jikeyng, msang balay kana ka sediq qnlhangan. Spuda pnsliyan ssediq mi hantaytang dayhyo ka msupu tumal cida, Akayeyhu soto u dmudul ptrawah psburah uuda keyngpo. Uuda niyi u hana prading han wa niqan seyhu, pnsliyan sediq, mi syakay dayhyo ka knhbaraw bay tumal mi ptrawah pprngaw kari, dndulan niya ka AD.2003 idas 2 meytaq hyo cida u wada ini ktuku ka kongmin topyaw cida. Wada pdanan kongmin topyaw ka sbrahansmmalu ka keyngpo u wada mrana ka biyax soto mi wada mlih ka kokoingkay mi keyngpo hwating. Spuda burah keyngpo, mniq kngkawas 2005 na seyngkyo kokoingkay daw, ida bay 2 ing ka kokoingkay u wada knpriyux 75 hiyi na murux bay ing kokoingkay. Kwotu seyhu mpdudul u wisu pkrana burah psbalay qmlahang, kiya mi muda psbalay quri mchdil bay quri uuda keyngpo. Wada pusa kari ka qnlhangan msupu lnglungan ingkay, idas 6 u muda soto seyngkyo, kiya mi mk3 idas daw muda kokoingkay na seyngkyo. Kngkawas 2005 cida u wada mrrudu ka cngcyu Ciarcis, quri so gikay tu2 seyngkyo kcka cida u wada mqbling muda, kndudul niqan knou bay hantay uuda, pusu bay sntangan dha u so musa malix biyax ka seyhu saya. Idas 3 diyax 24, hmrinas knbkiyan hiyi sediq ka mniq Piskay mssli smatang soto mi seyhu na ka malix biyax mi qpahun, kiya ka suchaya "Yucinsyang kming". Wada qduriq Hasak ka soto Akayeyhu, hiti daw wada dhuq Mosk. Idas 3 diyax 28, Ciarcis burah gikay u seykyo hantay na bukung, congri brah Paciyeyhu ka congri seyhu, rmirih qpahun soto. Mniq Mosk ka soto Akayeyhu u idas 4 diyax 4 u wada malax qpahun soto. Mniq kngkawas 2005 idas 7 diyax 10 na seyngkyo soto cida, Paciyeyhu u 89.4% ka nangal na hyo mi wada mangal soto, kiya mi idas 8 diyax 14 cida ka psdhuwan phiyu soto. Kngkawas 2008 idas 12, treybi seyhu kokong tyeynsu kwangpo kojyo (KTRK) pusa kari meysa Jiyu Oco Deyntay knama muway cyeymu so malu pqbhangun. Spuda kngkawas 2005 na kingal pnrngawan, KTRK u kasi ka pusa cyeymu niyi ka dhiya. KTRK u mniq kngkawas 2008 idas 10 diyax 8 wada msangan pusa pqbhangun Jiyu Oco deyntay. Brah 1 iyax sngayan han u, KTRK u ini dha dayi pusa ka radiyo cyeymu "Quri so ini mkhmuya mi so moknarux", rmngaw sa wada dha prdangan ka jayryaw ini dani pradiyo na, kiya mi niqan pnluban dha quri seyngkyo alang na idas 10 diyax 5. Paciyeyhu soto pa mniq kngkawas 2008 idas 9 msang rmngaw cyeymu niyi u mquri pnsliyan dhantay. Rmngaw ka KTRK u cyeymu Jiyu Oco deyntay wa "Scuqi so tbrinah lnglungan mi scuqi pnskari". Ukwocyey kisya pa mbiyax bay msang rmngaw wada malix pradiyo ka KTRK. Mniq pnsliyan dha pnkla kari kngkawas 2009 bnkuwan quri Kana qnlangan sinbung jiyu csu pa, Ciarcis mniq kcka 175 qnlhangan ka bnkuwan dha u tu125. Mniq kngkawas 2014 bnkuwan quri Kana qnlangan sinbung jiyu csu pa, Ciarcis mniq kcka 180 qnlhangan ka bnkuwan dha u tu97. Kngkawas 2009 idas 2 diyax 3, Kuarmanpyeyk Paciyeyhu soto u pusa kari kasi shmuk ka Manas kongcyun citi-wana kingal niyi ka cyusu citi hniti Amirika mniq Congya. Idas 2 diyax 19, gikay u wada dha pdan (78-1) ka gian pnusa seyhu quri pstqun pkbarux Amirika ka Manas kongcyun citi . Kiya mi, mnuda Ciarcis, Russia, Amirika waycyawkwan ka snpusal muda pprngaw daw, wada htranan Ciarcis ka pnrngawan shmuk ka citi. Idas 6 diyax 25, Ciarcis gikay u wada smruwa mniq Mey Manas kongcyun citi cicusang phiyu yuncwan congsin na pnrngawan. Burah htong u smruwa Amirika lmutuc dmuwi citi kiya, kiya mi pila knbrxan u kndadax kngkawas 1740 knbkiyan pila Amirika mrana dhuq 6000 knbkiyan pila Amirika. Citi niyi u uxay splawa "Manas kongcyun citi", wada thnganan "Ucu cwanyun congsin", wana nanaq qqiya ddiyun heytay ka hhqulun. Ddiyun Manas kongcyun citi cuxan han u ngalan kana cyusu citi heytay Amirika, knpriyux wana nanaq pquri Ahuhan mhadus hweycminsing sepey na yunsu congsin. Ciarcis ka qnlangan babaw dxral 20 psrabang balay qnlhangan uri: Kngkawas 2008 Ciarcis na psrabang kancu csu ka 1.8 (0 ka qnnaqah balay, 10 ka knmalu balay). Kngkawas 2010 umntxan muda kming dungan, "47 jikeyng" mi mntna hari kngkawas 2005 na Yucinsyang kming, pnyahan qnlhangan sediq u ini qqaras ndanan seyhu mi soto Paciyeyhu. Idas 4 diyax 7 kman cida, hantaypay u phiyu rinji seyhu, subway dha waycang brah Roca Awtongpayeywa ka ngalan rinji soto. Soto cida ka Paciyeyhu u wada qduriq tuhunac alang mkbrnux Awse. Rinji seyhu idas 5 diyax 19 u wada muda pnwaya, smkaul Roca Awtongpayeywa ka ngalan rinji soto. Muda pnwaya, qpahun kwotu sci soto pa dhuq kngkawas 2011 idas 12 diyax 31; kwotu sci soto u uka keynri tumal tu1 seyngkyo soto, Ciarcis mndungus seyhu u babaw idas 7 diyax 10 ka pssliyun phiyu. Ciarcis burah keyngpo cawan u mniq idas 6 diyax 27 Cweynmin kongcwey cida wada muda, burah keyngpo u hmtur biyax soto, sbway congri ka ou biyax. Tuhunac 2 co u alaw mtdiyal ka minjoku, mniq idas 6 diyax 28 dhuq idas 8 diyax 10 tbrnahun muda ka cinci cwangtay. Mniq kngkawas 2011 idas 10 kcka mnuda seyngkyo soto, bukung Ciarcis sehuy mincutang Aarmacpyeyk Atanpayeyhu ka wada mbiyax, mniq idas 12 ka psdhu phyuwan, wada msoto. Tiri Knkarac Wentay kanhan pankanhan, mniq kngkawas idas 7,8 mtilux hari ya bay mniq sesu 30˚, idas 12 dhuq idas 2 misan knskuy dhuq sesu ringsya 30˚. Ou dwiyaq cyorin, kana dxral qnlhangan u hmrinas 500m, 1/2 na nniqan u haypa 1000-3000m, 1/3 na nniqan u haypa 3000─4000m. Tunac daya u tbukuy tuiwil Tyeynsan dwiyaq tudu, tuiwil hunac u niqan Pamiar-Aray dwiyaq tudu. Wana tuiwil hunac mi tudaya u niqan dxral llbu. Yayung Narwen lmihu kana dxral qnlhangan, mniq kcka dxral qnlhangan u knbrawan u 540 km. Knbrawan Cuhe mniq kcka dxral qnlhangan u 220 km. Langu qsiya baraw dwiyaq Isek ka niqan bay hhangan langu ini khuda. Tarusing knkarac, knkarac u knbeyhing bay cweycu knpriyux. Pnyahan qsiya quyux kngkawas u 200-1000 hawmi. Singcng cyuhwa Kwohwa u psnakan 7 co(oblasty; pl.oblastlar),1su (shaary; pl.shaar), co, su sya secyu, knkana qnlhangan u niqan 60 ka cyu (raion). 7co 1su knkana u: Sotu Piskayk (sotu) Batken co (Batken, sohu u wa mniq Batken) Chuy co (Chuy, wa mniq Piskayk ka sohu) Jalabad co (Jalabad, wa mniq Jalalabad ka sotu) Naryn co (Naryn, wa mniq Naryn ka sohu) Osh co (Osh, wa mniq Osh ka sohu), kcka juga na 9 ka Osh su. Talas co (Talas, wa mniq Talas ka sohu) Ysyk Kol co (Ysyk Kol, wa mniq Karakear ka sohu) Kana singcng cyu na kwanyeyn u to bay snkulan congyang kana; binaw niqan uri ka mniq mthutaq nniqan na Cucu keyng (aiyl okmotus),peyyah mtrawah seyngkyo na sucang mi su gikay qmlahang. Kana Cucu keyng na beyhing mi tiping u ida bay so wana 20 ka alang nniqan sediq. Keyjay Ana so ou ka kndadax tuiwil, knkanna kwoci pila cicin cucu na ccu, dukuricu daw wada mqriqu bay ka quri keyjay Ciarcis. Hana prading han u, Suryeyn mawyi citwan cyeyti u wada mlih ka scang, hmtur qnlhangan mquri scang keyjay kwotu. Seyhu u tqlahang dmuwi hbangan, wada lixun duma ka dnyawan dha mumal dnyawan mhnuk bbari qqiya, kaycng cngcswey. Mniq knkingal uuda u ptura scang keyjay kwotu ka qcahur. Spuda mdhu bay keyjay mi knpriyux, seyhu u smatang phiyu malu pltudul pkrana na cingci mosu. Spuda snbrahan,Ciarcis u mniq kngkawas 1998 idas 12 diyax 20 tumal Qnlangan mawyi cucu uri. Mklhlah ka Suryeyn daw wada mkuuka ka knou bay scang, wada mchdil bay dndulan na Ciarcis na keyjay. Kngkawas 1990, 98% na cuko canpin u mquri Suryeyn na kana nniqan dha. So kiya u mniq 90 kngkkawas brah cida, keyjay Ciarcis u ini baka cbiyaw tumal konghkwo Suryeyn kana, wana mnccbu na Yameyniya, Yasaypayjan mi Tacik ka ini dha baka. Kngkawas so niyi u, wada knmalu hari ka keyjay dha, binaw ini so ttuku ka hbangan ngngalan dha, uka brahan pndungus mttuku syakay pawcang uri. Ciarcis u quri nongyey ka pusu bay stmanan dha. Kngkkawas 90 pnrdingan cida daw, sing nongyey na canpin ka wada dhuq kana nngalan na 1/3 dhuq 1/2. Kngkawas 2002, nongyey can kana GDP 35.6%, kiya mi wada pndungus dmka sediq ka mpqpah. Tndxral kcka qnlhangan Ciarcis u ou dwiyaq, malu pkrana qpahun tmabu tnbuwan, niyi ka pusu bay uuda nongyey Ciarcis. Pusu bay pnhuma dha pnwalang u tipiq mugi, chiya sama, wata, spriq puqan, ssama mi hiyi pnwalang. Ubal miric, hiyi mi smnalu miluku uri ka pusu bay nongcanpin. Nongcanpin cyakong ka kongyeyhwa na pusu bay pnsliyan niya, mquri waycu u niqan knbeyhing bay hnwetan niya. Ciarcis u niqan mttuku bay kwangcang, binaw uka ka gasoring mi gasu, ddha niyi u kasi ka sntama cinko. Qnlhangan niyi u niqan knou bay snkuwan dha mey, king, yo, ti mi duma ini hari qtayi xxiluy. Smmalu king ka qnlhangan Ciarcis pusu bay qpahun kongyey, seyhu u smatang hmuc wayc, dmudul wayhwang tiryeyn mi cyakong king. Alaw niqan mttuku bay qsiya mi dwiyaq mi nniqan lnlingay ka kcka dxral qnlhangan, malu dha cuko qnlhangan icil uri ka deyngki pneyyah biyax qsiya. Ciarcis pusu bay cuko canpin ka niqan rakaw na xiluy mi btunux kwang, ubal miric mi duma nongcanpin, deyngki mi duma kongcng canpin. Cinko gasoring, ida nkiya gasu, qalux xiluy, hwaswey canpin, knou bay kikay, qhuni, ppatas, duma uuqun mi qqiya ssalu sapah. Pusu bay pnspuwan dha mawyi u kiya knkana Amirika, Russia, Cyokoku, Doicu, Irang mi msdalih qnlhangan Tacik, Hasak, Ucpyeyk, Tukuman. Ciarcis pa pquri Amirika cuko Ti, sweyin, ini hari qtayi xxiluy mi hwasweypin, kndadax Amirika cinko uuqun pnwalang, iyu mi qqiya ddiyun pkmalu narux, abura sama, ppatas, buwax, kikay, songcicyu mi hiyi uqun. Ppanan rulu Knbawan elu ppanan kisya u 370 km, elu ppanan rulu u 30,300 km. Ppanan rulu ka pusu bay ppanun sediq. Quri so ppanan skoki u, wa mniq sotu Piskayk na "Manas" kwoci cicang mi Mosk, Sinsiporiya, Tasekan, Tusangpey alang mkbrnux u niqan snpngan diyax ppanan skoki, tuhuy dukuricu kwosyey icil na alang mkbrnux, mray so Urumuci, Istanpaw, Hwarankhu, Sintri, Krac uri u niqan snpngan diyax mi ini spngi diyax na ppanan skoki. Knhbrawan hiyi sediq Kngkawas 2019, knhbrawan hiyi sediq Ciarcis u niqan 6,389,500 hiyi, kcka na u, 34.4％ na kngkawas u ini dhuq 15 kngkawas, 6.2% na u hmrinas kngkawas 65. Wana ya bay 1/3 hiyi sediq u mniq alang mkbrnux. Jnko mitu u kingkingal pinghwang km u 25 hiyi sediq. Minjoku Niqan 80 kluwanan minjoku ka Ciarcis, knhbaraw bay hiyi u Ciarcis minjoku, kiya ka knkana sediq na 73.3%, mnTucyey minjoku; duma minjoku u kiya ka knkana Haracitan (8%), wa mssli tudaya na Russia joku (5.6%) mi wa mniq tuhunac ka Ucpyeyk joku (14.6%). Pusu bay ini khbaraw hiyi minjoku u kiya ka knkana sediq Tongkan (1.1%), Weuar joku (1.1%), Tack joku (1.1%), Hasak joku (0.7%), Ukran joku (0.5%) mi duma tikuh knhbrawan na minjoku (1.7%). Kngkawas 1999 dhuq kngkawas 2009 ka iyax 10 kngkawas u, wada mlih 16.3341 knbkiyan hiyi ka Russia joku Ciarcis, kiya mi wada mrana 10.1741 knbkiyan hiyi sediq ka Ucpyeyk joku Ciarcis. Niqan Tataar joku 3.3848 hiyi sediq ka Ciarcis uri, Tuarci joku u 3.6724 knbkiyan hiyi sediq, Yasaypayjan joku u 1.6745 knbkiyan hiyi sediq, Coseyng joku u 1.857 knbkiyan hiyi sediq, Doicu joku u 1.1128 knbkiyan hiyi sediq. Uxay wana dminjoku niyi, Ciarcis u niqan nina ka sediq Payorosu, sediq Tukuman, sediq Moartowa mi sediq Cyocya uri minjoku ka mniq hini. Sediq Ciarcis pa snaw u 49.4%, qridin u 50.6%. Wunhwa Pusu bay diyax smsung Pnyahan pnatas CIA 外交部 Tnhjil kari seejiq Watan Diro mtabug

= Korgyzstan = Gaga kska Yacow ka Korgyzstan, 41 00 N, 75 00 E ka gaga na nniqan. Kana ka knlbangan na o 199,951 sq km (hangan na o Tg87) (knlbanga dxgal o 191,801 sq km, knlbangan qsiya o 8,150 sq km). Kana ka sejiqon o niqan 5,727,553 hiyi. Gaga Bishkek ka poso alang paro, jiyax 31 idas 8 ka jiyax skrayan klwaan. Mano ka dxgal Korgyzstan ga wada sogan 55.40% ka dxgal qpahan, 5.10% ka dxgal bboyo, rahoq dxgal do niqan 39.50% na. Bokong klwaan ta sayang o kiya ka Almazbek Atambayev, pnaah hngkawas2011 idas 12 jiyax 1pnrajing kmlawa klwaan. cinkholan sa knita' sa brbiro' = Ciarcis = Ciarcis Konghkwo ngalan dha Ciarcis, kiya ka kingal qnlhangan wa mniq dxral kcka Asia. Todaya Ciarcis mi Hasak o msqapah, toiwal ka Ucpik, toiwil honac ka Tacik, tonarac o msdalih Cyokoko. Piskayk ka soto Ciarcis mi knbeyhing bay alang mkbrnox. Knrodan bay qnlhangan kcka Asia, niqan 2000 kngkawas ka rikisi Ciarcis, mnoda oo klowanan wangcaw mi bongka. Alaw ka wa tqriyan dwiyaq mi pbroxon nanaq, kiya ka malo pltodol ka bongka Ciarcis; kiya mi alaw nniqan lnlingay ori, wa mniq strngan oo klowanan waya ka Ciarcis. Ana so qnbsyaqan bay nniqan dha mniq Ciarcis ka knoo bay alang, binaw mncon niqan qnhlangan icil miyah knrmox qmlahang. Dhoq kngkawas 1991 peyyah ida nSoryeyn babaw dokorico daw, wada mkingal niqan dokorico poso biyax na minjoko qnlhangan ka Ciarcis. Pnwaya qori seyji o morox kingal mi gikay. Ana beytaq saya o mncon niqan mtdiyal ka minjoko, pspaox prrodo mi qnnriqo qori keyjay. Saya o wiso tomal Dokorico pnsliyan qnlhangan, Oco keyjay ryeynmong mi Citi anjeyng ryeynmong na qnlhangan; kiya ori o tomal Sanghay hecwococo, Isran hecwococo, Tocyey gikay mi Tocyey bongka kwoci coco na cngyeynkwo. Ciarcis pa niqan 570 kinbkiyan knhbrawan hiyi sediq. Poso bay minjoko ka Ciarcis joko (Mniq kcka dxral Cyokoko ka Ciarcis o ngalan dha Kearkc joko), msngari o Ucpeyk joko mi Rossia joko. Kari Ciarcis ka ngalan kari qnlhangan, kiya mi mniq 1 seyki ka dndolan mkRossia cngce ida kari Rossia ka ddiyon dha balay mi ngalan srngaw kari seyho. 64% knhbrawan sediq ka ocongpay Moslim. Uxay wana niqan bongka Tocyey nanaq, bongka Ciarcis pa wada dndolan bongka Mongko, bongka Poso mi bongka Rossia ori. Ris Spoda kngkawas so niyi hari o Ciarcis mi Cyokoko rikisi sweycya ka wada sndiyan, qnbsyaqan bay rikisi Ciarcis o malo bhraon dhoq brah AD. 201. Jidayi saya o niqan bnatas qnbsyaqan bay patas ka "Soci", cida ka sediq Ciarcis o splawa dha Cyeynkon. Kari Tocyey o Qırğız, kiya ka patas bnatas Soci Cyokoko sonca Cikas, kiya ka sediq Kearkc saya, "Soci" ka mnwaya bay bnatas qori ndanan sediq Karkc, splawa dha "Kekon". Ryanghan cida o splawa dha "Cyeynkon", WeyCin Nanpeycaw dhoq Sweytay cida o splawa dha "Cyeyko", "Ciko", "Hko", "Hoko". Tangtay cida spoda hnang kari Han o splawa dha "Syakas". Utay 10 qnlhangan, Ryaw, Song, King cida splawa dha "Hricis" Dongan, Mongko tikwo, Yentay cida o splawa dha "Ciricis" ori, Kana pnhangan niyi o kiya ka dmowi knkingal ndanan cida ini pntna hnang kari pnhangan. Cingtay cida spoda pnlawa dha sediq Mongko Erot o, splawa dha Porot. Kiya ka Man, Cinca, Citan minjoko pnyahan Hasak Hankwo o pnlawa dha Ciarcis ka "Seartkrk" (dongos na o "sediq icil"), oxay na tnposo Ciarcis. Tnposo balay nniqan sediq Ciarcis o mnniq tohonac Siporiya, dxral todaya yayong Yeynise. Mndanan knrmojx qmlahang Syongno, babaw to2 kcka seyki daw yahan knrmox qmlahang Tocyey Hankwo, Hweyhe Hankwo, bokoy daw mniq kngyeyn kngkawa 840 o wada dha ini baka ka Hweyhe Hankwo dmi wada dokorico bsiyaq hari, dhoq kngyeyn kngkawas 924 daw kiya ka wada yahan knrmox qmlahang Ryawcaw pnhyowan na Yeyryoapawci. Yeyntay o mniq todaya yayong Yeynise phiyo Yiranco, Cyeynco. Dhoq 17 seyki, wada yahan snhor pddayak Cwenkear Hankwo sediq Mongko mi sediq Rossia tikwo, wada kndodol thdil lmiqo dwiyaq Tyeysan na qori lango Isek, kiya ka nniqan Ciarcis saya. Cingtay, alang Ciarcis pa psnakan Tonarac Porot, Toiwil Porot. Toiwil Porot o tmabo tnbowan mniq dxral kcka Hweypo, skdakar qmlahang Kskar Cancan Tacn mi knkingan elo Coca Tacn, Tonarac Porot ka Cingcaw cingway na tnoalang sediq Tnposo. Tangcaw AD. 640 idas 9 diyax 19 (Cnkwan kngkawas 14 idas 8 kweyyi, nongri idas 8 diyax 28), Cyawhtaw singcyon tacongkwan Hocyonci ping Kawcang, ngalan na phiyo Sico ka dxral hiya. AD. 640 idas 10 diyax 11 (Cnkwan kngkawas 14 idas 9 imaw, nongri idas 9 diyax 21), mniq Sico phiyo Ansi tohoho, pqriyon dha qori Toiwil Tocyey. Cnkwan kngkawas 22 (AD. 648), Ansi tohoho thdilan dhoq Kweyc. Tang Kawcong Syeycing kngkawas 2 (AD. 657) idas 11, wada ini baka Tangcyon ka Tocyey, wada thdilon nniqan Kawcang Dongan ka Ansi tohoho. Syeyncing kngkawas 3 idas 5 (AD. 657), Ansi tohoho o wada thdilon Kweyc (Kocyo saya), wada mkala mtatohoho ka Ansi tohoho. Tang Kawcong o knpriyox Taycong cida wana snbeyhing qmita cyonso mi sntikoh mita qmlahang singcng ka ooda na, mniq nniqan dxral Tocyey psnakan phiyo Mongc tohoho mi Kwenring tohoho, kiya mi psnakon phiyo Cyomi coho ka ttiping qnlhangan sdan dhiya, dxral toiwil o dhoq Poso, kiya ka to bay dxral Ansi tahoho kana, so kasi yahi qmlahang Tangcaw kana ka dxral qori hini. Syeyncing kngkawas 5 (AD. 660), wa mniq Congring toiwil na Tocyey Tomapo o wada smnol Tang, snkaol sediq mosa qmita ka cawting. Tang Kawcong Rongsyo kngkawas pnrdingan (AD. 661), snkaol Tohworwo tawcoco syeynso Waming qmita toiwil Congring dongan, mniq toiwil Yotyeyn, tonarac Poso 16 qnlhangan, phiyo 16 totoho, kana bay o 80 ka co, 110 ka keyng, 126 ka cyoho, kiya mi mniq Tohworwo phiyo pnsdhowan smnro ndanan niyi. Mniq cida, Ansi tatohoho na qmlahang knkana Ansi socn, Mongco, Kwenring tohoho (dxral nniqan toiwil Tocyey cbiyaw), Cawwo 9 sing, Tohworwo dhoq Poso totoho, mntna hari so knbeyhing pnspowan Sincyang mi Congya 5 qnlhangan, Ahohan saya. Babaw Rongsyo kngkawas 2 (kongyeyn 662) adw, Tohwan mi Tangcaw o snposal pplok Ansi 4 cn, hini o oo bay yiso, dhoq Tang Tcongcnyeyn kngkawas 6 (kongyen kngkawas 790), Ansi 4 cn o wada skkingal pkngaton kana. Ucetyeyn Cangan kngkawas 2 (AD.702), phiyo Peyting tohoho, qmlahang ida qmnlahangan Ansi tatohoho ka Tyeynsan peyro, tonarac Jehay na dxral nniqan toiwil Tocyey, wana Tyeynsan nanro mi nniqan tonarac Congring ka qlhangan Ansi tatohoho, kiya ka dhoq mdakar sntangan aawah dha mpkrmox qori Sco cro mqori todaya mcbo ka Tohwan. Siryaw cida Siryaw (AD.1124 dhoq 1218) kiya ka sediq Citan Yeyryotaso pnhiyo na qnlhangan, hiti daw wada mrana dhoq Congya, Hosworotwo (wa mniq msdalih Ciarcis Tokmak na alang mkbrnox Porana saya), cida o mbiyax bay qnlhangan Congya. AD.1218 cida o wada pkngaton heytay Mongko dndolan Cngcishan. Dxral cbiyaw nniqan Siryaw pa wa mniq dxral Cngcishan psowan na to2 hiyi risaw na Cahtay, Cahtay Hankwo hiti daw wada dmodol ddiyon bay kari Cahtay (hiti daw wada mkkari Weyoar mi mkkari Ucpeyk). Cahtay Hankwo cida (13-14 seyki) ) Cahtay Hankwo o ida kiya dxral Tyeymocn pndongos na to2 risaw na Cahtay. Pnrdingan bay dxral nniqan cbiyaw o, kiya ka knkana Tyeynsan naro mi Tyeynsan peyro mi yayong Yortos mi yayong Manas ryoyo mi iyax yayong Ymo mi yayong Siar na nniqan yayong Congya (mbiyax bay cida o peyyah dwiyaq Aartay dhoq Syeynhay). Hana balay han o phyowan mniq msdalih Arimari na Hoyas (Koarri), kiya ka Cyoka jnmin konghkwo na Sincyang Hwocngsyeyn Sweytingcn toiwil daya. Cahtay Hankwo cyoco Towa mi Wokwotay Hankwo cyonco Hayto o mnsopo, snposal mccbo heytay Weyncaw,beytaq Hopiryey cida o ini stoq na,mndhoq mangal canmopey Harahrin. Dhoq kongyeyn 1304 o prading tohoy Haytocca to8 risaw na Weyncngcong psbalay. Cingcaw cida Cingkawcong Cyeynrong kngkawas 22 (AD.1757), pingting Cwenkear Mongko daw, wada yahan knrmox qmlahang Cingcaw ka sediq Ciarcis. Mqori Cingcaw thmoko ka sediq Ciarcis pa wada dha splawa "Porot"; psnakan tonarac mi toiwil ddha, toiwil Porot o wa mniq tnoda yomo toiwil yayong todaya na Ksekear, Yeyarcyang toiwil honac; kana bay o niqan 4 beyhing alang; tonarac Porot o wa tnoda yomo Use, toiwil daya Akso, toiwil honac Iri, knkana bay o niqan 5 alang. Hhiti daw wada mowic ka Cingcaw dmi, mniq AD.1864 na "Cong E kan psnakan tnoayos toiwil daya weyci" wada bqanan Rossia tikwo ka Waysipey, alaw snol tndxral mniq ka sediq, sediq Ciarcis o kndadax ndanan knrmox qmlahang Rossia (doma o alaw wada tbrinah knciyok ka Cwenkear Hankwo mi wada sobway Heyrongcyang Hoyokeyng Cyeyrongti. Rikisi msdalih hari kngkawas niyi 18 seyki, nniqan Ciarcis saya pnsnaqan Cwenkear Mongko (todaya) mi Hawhan Hankwo (tohonac) na biyax nniqan dxral. 19 seyki kngkkawas 20, wada mrana ka biyax Hawhan, kana nniqan Ciarcis o wada mnHawhan Hankwo kana. AD.1854, mosa knrmox mcbo Hawhan Hankwo ka Rossia, kiya mi spoda oo klowanan waycyaw sotwan pkiyox Cingting srwanan dokorico hnyowan kana ka nniqan Congya knkingal Hwanso. AD.1876 cida, wada pkngaton ka qnlhangan Hawhan, knkana nniqan Ciarcis o wada yahan knrmox qmlahang Rossia kana. Wada krmxan qmlahang Rossia pa, sntorong oo bay knciyok, niqan hbaraw bay sediq o wada kasi latac nniqan dha tndxral mi wada thdil icil, mtmay Pamiar brnox baraw mi Ahohan; binaw doma o, mntna qlhangan cida o Cingcaw nniqan Syakan na sediq Hwey ka tbrinah knciyok, wada ini baka ka sediq Hwey o thdil mqori todaya dhoq mkngaho yayong Co saya, wada mrodan cbiyaw sediq Tongkan. AD.1916 cida, moroc knciyok ondo ka Rossia, hbaraw bay sediq Ciarcis o kndadax Congya thdil dhoq pnhyowan borah na Cyokaminkoko cida. AD.1922 cida, phiyo cida ka Soryeyn o mnTocyey Stan Soweyay Sehoycoyi Cckonghkwo. AD.1924 cida, moda pnwaya tnoayos minjoko ka nniqan Congya, Ciarcis saya o psdho phiyo Kara Ciarcis Ccco, wada tomal Rossia Ryeynpang. AD.1925 cida o wada knpriyox hangan Ciarcis Ccco, dhoq AD.1926 cida daw wada mkala Ciarcis Soweyay Sehoycoyi Cckonghkwo Dongan. AD.1936 idas 12 diyax 5, balay bay psdhowan phiyo ka Ciarcis Soweyay Sehoycoyi Konghkwo, wada tomal ryeynpang na Soryeyn. AD.1991 idas 8 diyax 19, konghkwo cinci cwangtay yingkay (SCSE) dha o sntama biyax dnyawan qori Mosok, smatang dha plixon ka soto Akayeyho. Wada ini pndongos dmi babaw kingal iyax sngayan, Akayeyho mi hoko soto Kocnyeytoho o posa kari mlatac Soryeyn kyosanto, malix qpahon soki, kiya mi wada na plhlah kana ka qnpringan seyho. Wada dndolan ooda niyi, lmotoc mniq idas 8 diyax 31 na knbeyhing bay Soweyay gikay meytaq hyocida o posa kari ptalax kndadax Soryeyn dokorico, AD.1933 idas 5 diyax 5, wada knpriyox hangan qnlhangan Ciarcis Konghkwo. Cngc AD.1990 kngkkawas pnrdingan cida, peyyah kcka kyosanto knproyox pssli ka Ciarcis mico ondo (Democratic Movement Kyrgyzstan, DMK) mi Awse o wada msminjoko mtdiyal, wada ini snhiyi ssediq mi gikay ka Ciarcis kyosanto to1 soki Masariyeyho , wada mlih ka biyax ddha dha daw, Akayeyho , Ciarcis ksweyyan na ingcyo, mniq AD.1990 idas 10 msdorox syeynkyo cida wada mangal 95% hyo mi mangal soto mwaya bay soto peyyah dokorico. AD.1993 cida wada psdhon ka keyngpo pa seyho tico o minco konghco na konghkwo. Singcng pomn o knkana soto mi congri, kokoingkay o pnwaya 2 ing, shwa pomn o kiya ka knkana knbaraw hoing, keyngpo hwating, tihwang hoing mi keynsa congcang. Spoda qnqriqo ka keyjay, AD.1994 kngkkawas kcka prading, Akayeyho o kndodol mqori dmowi weycweyn qmlahang. Lmotoc oo kngkawas, mniq kcka gikay mtdiyal kari, Akayeyho spoda kongmin meytaq hyo msdorox meysa dnkohan ssediq qnlhangan, knkana AD.1996 idas 2 mi AD.1998 idas 10 na snbrinah smmalo keyngpo pkrana biyax soto mi snbrinah knpriyox waya seyngkyo. AD.2002 idas 3 mniq tohonac nniqan Ahesi o, niqan 6 hiyi sediq hantay knhmoc qmraq bokong hantaytang na sediq mpdodol seyji o, wada bon poniq phoqil jikeyng, msang balay kana ka sediq qnlhangan. Spoda pnsliyan ssediq mi hantaytang dayhyo ka msopo tomal cida, Akayeyho soto o dmodol ptrawah psborah ooda keyngpo. Uoda niyi o hana prading han wa niqan seyho, pnsliyan sediq, mi syakay dayhyo ka knhbaraw bay tomal mi ptrawah pprngaw kari, dndolan niya ka AD.2003 idas 2 meytaq hyo cida o wada ini ktoko ka kongmin topyaw cida. Wada pdanan kongmin topyaw ka sbrahansmmalo ka keyngpo o wada mrana ka biyax soto mi wada mlih ka kokoingkay mi keyngpo hwating. Spoda borah keyngpo, mniq kngkawas 2005 na seyngkyo kokoingkay daw, ida bay 2 ing ka kokoingkay o wada knpriyox 75 hiyi na morox bay ing kokoingkay. Kwoto seyho mpdodol o wiso pkrana borah psbalay qmlahang, kiya mi moda psbalay qori mchdil bay qori ooda keyngpo. Wada posa kari ka qnlhangan msopo lnglongan ingkay, idas 6 o moda soto seyngkyo, kiya mi mk3 idas daw moda kokoingkay na seyngkyo. Kngkawas 2005 cida o wada mrrodo ka cngcyo Ciarcis, qori so gikay to2 seyngkyo kcka cida o wada mqbling moda, kndodol niqan knoo bay hantay ooda, poso bay sntangan dha o so mosa malix biyax ka seyho saya. Idas 3 diyax 24, hmrinas knbkiyan hiyi sediq ka mniq Piskay mssli smatang soto mi seyho na ka malix biyax mi qpahon, kiya ka sochaya "Yocinsyang kming". Wada qdoriq Hasak ka soto Akayeyho, hiti daw wada dhoq Mosk. Idas 3 diyax 28, Ciarcis borah gikay o seykyo hantay na bokong, congri brah Paciyeyho ka congri seyho, rmirih qpahon soto. Mniq Mosk ka soto Akayeyho o idas 4 diyax 4 o wada malax qpahon soto. Mniq kngkawas 2005 idas 7 diyax 10 na seyngkyo soto cida, Paciyeyho o 89.4% ka nangal na hyo mi wada mangal soto, kiya mi idas 8 diyax 14 cida ka psdhowan phiyo soto. Kngkawas 2008 idas 12, treybi seyho kokong tyeynso kwangpo kojyo (KTRK) posa kari meysa Jiyo Oco Deyntay knama moway cyeymo so malo pqbhangon. Spoda kngkawas 2005 na kingal pnrngawan, KTRK o kasi ka posa cyeymo niyi ka dhiya. KTRK o mniq kngkawas 2008 idas 10 diyax 8 wada msangan posa pqbhangon Jiyo Oco deyntay. Brah 1 iyax sngayan han o, KTRK o ini dha dayi posa ka radiyo cyeymo "Qori so ini mkhmoya mi so moknarox", rmngaw sa wada dha prdangan ka jayryaw ini dani pradiyo na, kiya mi niqan pnloban dha qori seyngkyo alang na idas 10 diyax 5. Paciyeyho soto pa mniq kngkawas 2008 idas 9 msang rmngaw cyeymo niyi o mqori pnsliyan dhantay. Rmngaw ka KTRK o cyeymo Jiyo Oco deyntay wa "Scoqi so tbrinah lnglongan mi scoqi pnskari". Ukwocyey kisya pa mbiyax bay msang rmngaw wada malix pradiyo ka KTRK. Mniq pnsliyan dha pnkla kari kngkawas 2009 bnkowan qori Kana qnlangan sinbong jiyo cso pa, Ciarcis mniq kcka 175 qnlhangan ka bnkowan dha o to125. Mniq kngkawas 2014 bnkowan qori Kana qnlangan sinbong jiyo cso pa, Ciarcis mniq kcka 180 qnlhangan ka bnkowan dha o to97. Kngkawas 2009 idas 2 diyax 3, Koarmanpyeyk Paciyeyho soto o posa kari kasi shmok ka Manas kongcyon citi-wana kingal niyi ka cyoso citi hniti Amirika mniq Congya. Idas 2 diyax 19, gikay o wada dha pdan (78-1) ka gian pnosa seyho qori pstqon pkbarox Amirika ka Manas kongcyon citi . Kiya mi, mnoda Ciarcis, Rossia, Amirika waycyawkwan ka snposal moda pprngaw daw, wada htranan Ciarcis ka pnrngawan shmok ka citi. Idas 6 diyax 25, Ciarcis gikay o wada smrowa mniq Mey Manas kongcyon citi cicosang phiyo yoncwan congsin na pnrngawan. Borah htong o smrowa Amirika lmotoc dmowi citi kiya, kiya mi pila knbrxan o kndadax kngkawas 1740 knbkiyan pila Amirika mrana dhoq 6000 knbkiyan pila Amirika. Citi niyi o oxay splawa "Manas kongcyon citi", wada thnganan "Uco cwanyon congsin", wana nanaq qqiya ddiyon heytay ka hhqolon. Ddiyon Manas kongcyon citi coxan han o ngalan kana cyoso citi heytay Amirika, knpriyox wana nanaq pqori Ahohan mhados hweycminsing sepey na yonso congsin. Ciarcis ka qnlangan babaw dxral 20 psrabang balay qnlhangan ori: Kngkawas 2008 Ciarcis na psrabang kanco cso ka 1.8 (0 ka qnnaqah balay, 10 ka knmalo balay). Kngkawas 2010 omntxan moda kming dongan, "47 jikeyng" mi mntna hari kngkawas 2005 na Yocinsyang kming, pnyahan qnlhangan sediq o ini qqaras ndanan seyho mi soto Paciyeyho. Idas 4 diyax 7 kman cida, hantaypay o phiyo rinji seyho, sobway dha waycang brah Roca Awtongpayeywa ka ngalan rinji soto. Soto cida ka Paciyeyho o wada qdoriq tohonac alang mkbrnox Awse. Rinji seyho idas 5 diyax 19 o wada moda pnwaya, smkaol Roca Awtongpayeywa ka ngalan rinji soto. Moda pnwaya, qpahon kwoto sci soto pa dhoq kngkawas 2011 idas 12 diyax 31; kwoto sci soto o oka keynri tomal to1 seyngkyo soto, Ciarcis mndongos seyho o babaw idas 7 diyax 10 ka pssliyon phiyo. Ciarcis borah keyngpo cawan o mniq idas 6 diyax 27 Cweynmin kongcwey cida wada moda, borah keyngpo o hmtor biyax soto, sbway congri ka oo biyax. Tohonac 2 co o alaw mtdiyal ka minjoko, mniq idas 6 diyax 28 dhoq idas 8 diyax 10 tbrnahon moda ka cinci cwangtay. Mniq kngkawas 2011 idas 10 kcka mnoda seyngkyo soto, bokong Ciarcis sehoy mincotang Aarmacpyeyk Atanpayeyho ka wada mbiyax, mniq idas 12 ka psdho phyowan, wada msoto. Tiri Knkarac Wentay kanhan pankanhan, mniq kngkawas idas 7,8 mtilox hari ya bay mniq seso 30˚, idas 12 dhoq idas 2 misan knskoy dhoq seso ringsya 30˚. Oo dwiyaq cyorin, kana dxral qnlhangan o hmrinas 500m, 1/2 na nniqan o haypa 1000-3000m, 1/3 na nniqan o haypa 3000─4000m. Tonac daya o tbokoy toiwil Tyeynsan dwiyaq todo, toiwil honac o niqan Pamiar-Aray dwiyaq todo. Wana toiwil honac mi todaya o niqan dxral llbo. Yayong Narwen lmiho kana dxral qnlhangan, mniq kcka dxral qnlhangan o knbrawan o 540 km. Knbrawan Cohe mniq kcka dxral qnlhangan o 220 km. Lango qsiya baraw dwiyaq Isek ka niqan bay hhangan lango ini khoda. Tarosing knkarac, knkarac o knbeyhing bay cweyco knpriyox. Pnyahan qsiya qoyox kngkawas o 200-1000 hawmi. Singcng cyohwa Kwohwa o psnakan 7 co(oblasty; pl.oblastlar),1so (shaary; pl.shaar), co, so sya secyo, knkana qnlhangan o niqan 60 ka cyo (raion). 7co 1so knkana o: Soto Piskayk (soto) Batken co (Batken, soho o wa mniq Batken) Choy co (Choy, wa mniq Piskayk ka soho) Jalabad co (Jalabad, wa mniq Jalalabad ka soto) Naryn co (Naryn, wa mniq Naryn ka soho) Osh co (Osh, wa mniq Osh ka soho), kcka joga na 9 ka Osh so. Talas co (Talas, wa mniq Talas ka soho) Ysyk Kol co (Ysyk Kol, wa mniq Karakear ka soho) Kana singcng cyo na kwanyeyn o to bay snkolan congyang kana; binaw niqan ori ka mniq mthotaq nniqan na Coco keyng (aiyl okmotos),peyyah mtrawah seyngkyo na socang mi so gikay qmlahang. Kana Coco keyng na beyhing mi tiping o ida bay so wana 20 ka alang nniqan sediq. Keyjay Ana so oo ka kndadax toiwil, knkanna kwoci pila cicin coco na cco, dokorico daw wada mqriqo bay ka qori keyjay Ciarcis. Hana prading han o, Soryeyn mawyi citwan cyeyti o wada mlih ka scang, hmtor qnlhangan mqori scang keyjay kwoto. Seyho o tqlahang dmowi hbangan, wada lixon doma ka dnyawan dha momal dnyawan mhnok bbari qqiya, kaycng cngcswey. Mniq knkingal ooda o ptora scang keyjay kwoto ka qcahor. Spoda mdho bay keyjay mi knpriyox, seyho o smatang phiyo malo pltodol pkrana na cingci moso. Spoda snbrahan,Ciarcis o mniq kngkawas 1998 idas 12 diyax 20 tomal Qnlangan mawyi coco ori. Mklhlah ka Soryeyn daw wada mkooka ka knoo bay scang, wada mchdil bay dndolan na Ciarcis na keyjay. Kngkawas 1990, 98% na coko canpin o mqori Soryeyn na kana nniqan dha. So kiya o mniq 90 kngkkawas brah cida, keyjay Ciarcis o ini baka cbiyaw tomal konghkwo Soryeyn kana, wana mnccbo na Yameyniya, Yasaypayjan mi Tacik ka ini dha baka. Kngkawas so niyi o, wada knmalo hari ka keyjay dha, binaw ini so ttoko ka hbangan ngngalan dha, oka brahan pndongos mttoko syakay pawcang ori. Ciarcis o qori nongyey ka poso bay stmanan dha. Kngkkawas 90 pnrdingan cida daw, sing nongyey na canpin ka wada dhoq kana nngalan na 1/3 dhoq 1/2. Kngkawas 2002, nongyey can kana GDP 35.6%, kiya mi wada pndongos dmka sediq ka mpqpah. Tndxral kcka qnlhangan Ciarcis o oo dwiyaq, malo pkrana qpahon tmabo tnbowan, niyi ka poso bay ooda nongyey Ciarcis. Poso bay pnhoma dha pnwalang o tipiq mogi, chiya sama, wata, spriq poqan, ssama mi hiyi pnwalang. Ubal miric, hiyi mi smnalo miloko ori ka poso bay nongcanpin. Nongcanpin cyakong ka kongyeyhwa na poso bay pnsliyan niya, mqori wayco o niqan knbeyhing bay hnwetan niya. Ciarcis o niqan mttoko bay kwangcang, binaw oka ka gasoring mi gaso, ddha niyi o kasi ka sntama cinko. Qnlhangan niyi o niqan knoo bay snkowan dha mey, king, yo, ti mi doma ini hari qtayi xxiloy. Smmalo king ka qnlhangan Ciarcis poso bay qpahon kongyey, seyho o smatang hmoc wayc, dmodol wayhwang tiryeyn mi cyakong king. Alaw niqan mttoko bay qsiya mi dwiyaq mi nniqan lnlingay ka kcka dxral qnlhangan, malo dha coko qnlhangan icil ori ka deyngki pneyyah biyax qsiya. Ciarcis poso bay coko canpin ka niqan rakaw na xiloy mi btonox kwang, obal miric mi doma nongcanpin, deyngki mi doma kongcng canpin. Cinko gasoring, ida nkiya gaso, qalox xiloy, hwaswey canpin, knoo bay kikay, qhoni, ppatas, doma ooqon mi qqiya ssalo sapah. Poso bay pnspowan dha mawyi o kiya knkana Amirika, Rossia, Cyokoko, Doico, Irang mi msdalih qnlhangan Tacik, Hasak, Ucpyeyk, Tokoman. Ciarcis pa pqori Amirika coko Ti, sweyin, ini hari qtayi xxiloy mi hwasweypin, kndadax Amirika cinko ooqon pnwalang, iyo mi qqiya ddiyon pkmalo narox, abora sama, ppatas, bowax, kikay, songcicyo mi hiyi oqon. Ppanan rolo Knbawan elo ppanan kisya o 370 km, elo ppanan rolo o 30,300 km. Ppanan rolo ka poso bay ppanon sediq. Qori so ppanan skoki o, wa mniq soto Piskayk na "Manas" kwoci cicang mi Mosk, Sinsiporiya, Tasekan, Tosangpey alang mkbrnox o niqan snpngan diyax ppanan skoki, tohoy dokorico kwosyey icil na alang mkbrnox, mray so Uromoci, Istanpaw, Hwarankho, Sintri, Krac ori o niqan snpngan diyax mi ini spngi diyax na ppanan skoki. Knhbrawan hiyi sediq Kngkawas 2019, knhbrawan hiyi sediq Ciarcis o niqan 6,389,500 hiyi, kcka na o, 34.4％ na kngkawas o ini dhoq 15 kngkawas, 6.2% na o hmrinas kngkawas 65. Wana ya bay 1/3 hiyi sediq o mniq alang mkbrnox. Jnko mito o kingkingal pinghwang km o 25 hiyi sediq. Minjoko Niqan 80 klowanan minjoko ka Ciarcis, knhbaraw bay hiyi o Ciarcis minjoko, kiya ka knkana sediq na 73.3%, mnTocyey minjoko; doma minjoko o kiya ka knkana Haracitan (8%), wa mssli todaya na Rossia joko (5.6%) mi wa mniq tohonac ka Ucpyeyk joko (14.6%). Poso bay ini khbaraw hiyi minjoko o kiya ka knkana sediq Tongkan (1.1%), Weoar joko (1.1%), Tack joko (1.1%), Hasak joko (0.7%), Ukran joko (0.5%) mi doma tikoh knhbrawan na minjoko (1.7%). Kngkawas 1999 dhoq kngkawas 2009 ka iyax 10 kngkawas o, wada mlih 16.3341 knbkiyan hiyi ka Rossia joko Ciarcis, kiya mi wada mrana 10.1741 knbkiyan hiyi sediq ka Ucpyeyk joko Ciarcis. Niqan Tataar joko 3.3848 hiyi sediq ka Ciarcis ori, Toarci joko o 3.6724 knbkiyan hiyi sediq, Yasaypayjan joko o 1.6745 knbkiyan hiyi sediq, Coseyng joko o 1.857 knbkiyan hiyi sediq, Doico joko o 1.1128 knbkiyan hiyi sediq. Uxay wana dminjoko niyi, Ciarcis o niqan nina ka sediq Payoroso, sediq Tokoman, sediq Moartowa mi sediq Cyocya ori minjoko ka mniq hini. Sediq Ciarcis pa snaw o 49.4%, qridin o 50.6%. Wonhwa Poso bay diyax smsong Pnyahan pnatas CIA 外交部 Tnhjil kari seejiq Watan Diro mtabog
